body: $QQQ $AAPL will miss earnings

$SPY $DJIA $QQQ $AAPL $TSLA  
 
One of the worst effects of the FED pumping markets so high with a ridiculous amount of free money liquidity is the loss in faith that will come as Millennials watch stocks crash back to more realistic valuations as the FED attempts to pull liquidity from the system and their 401k's crater. 
 
And just as many Millennials feel cheated with the Boomer advice "get and education and you will have a good life" they will no longer trust Boomers when they say "invest in stocks for your future". The will see the FED and the financial markets as a scam, a  dying Ponzi and relic of the Boomer generation that stole their future to make sure Boomers retired with the wealth they demanded. 
 
Millennials are the largest generation alive and the future of the financial markets.  
 
Let's hope JPOW doesn't kill the market's next "golden goose".

$SPY $TSLA $AAPL 

My thoughts on this stock mkt correction .... 

First off,  I appreciate all of your interest in joining my site. But know up front, this is a subscription based educational site - and it is not cheap. Like most things in life, you get what you pay for. I will let you decide what value you place on getting ahead of big stock mkt moves, as I have been since SPY 480 print and calling for a correction. There is a reason I have a high retention rate and it is because I put an enormous amount of time and effort into my craft. 

As for the correction we are in, "buy the dip" ended weeks ago as I've been telling my members. We are now in the "sell the rip" phase and that will not end until 3 things happen (I discuss all three in tomorrow's Game Plan). 

Some free advice. 1) limit your risk. Take losses. I take plenty. It's why I'm successful. 2) in corrections, be patient. Let stocks come to you. Do not chase. 3) stay off margin.

Jessielivermore1929@gmail.com

This could be the beginning of a bearish trend. I truly believe we wont see 180 again in the first half of this year and the top is in for now. links.title: The 'Black Friday' Crypto Crash That Wiped Out $136B Was Caused By...
links.description: Today one of the biggest economies in the world proposed banning the use and mining of cryptocurrencies on Russian territory. According to them, cryptocurrency acted as a threat to financial stability, and reasons pertaining to citizens' wellbeing and its monetary policy sovereignty drove the ban.

links.title: Single stock options worth $1.2 trillion set to expire - Options Solutions
links.description: Jan 21 (Reuters) - Single stock options totaling about $1.28 trillion were set to expire on Friday, potentially driving sharp market movements as Wall Street rounds out a turbulent week, analysts at Options Solutions said. The options expiration represents nearly 40% of the total open interest on a notional basis, according to the Chicago-based investment adviser.

$TSLA

https://teslaresearch.jimdofree.com/list-of-tesla-patents/

I do not know why some people feel that the traditional automobile companies will pose competitive threat to $TSLA which has disrupted the traditional car by integrating across multiple verticals.

The only company that could go after them is $AAPL, but then they are 5 to 8 years behind and have no unique strength or innovation in high speed transportation..

I would say the Chinese companies may have the potential to build something through copying … at a lower cost by infringing IP of $TSLA

links.title: List of Tesla patents
